original_text: Now Jericho was shut up inside and outside because of the people of Israel. None went out, and none came in.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손들로 말미암아 여리고는 굳게 닫혔고 출입하는 자가 없더라

sentences.original_text: Now Jericho was shut up inside and outside
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여리고는 안팎으로 굳게 닫혀 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: because of the people of Israel
